About Me

Hello, I am Raza. I am a Machine Learning Engineer with over 1.5 years of experience. I was born in Pakistan but I am currently residing in a city called Stuttgart in Germany. I am a native speaker of Urdu and English (near native). I can also speak German at a basic level but I am persistently learning and improving day by day.

I am about to finish a Master of Science degree in Communications and Multimedia engineering (with specialization in Machine Learning) from one of the prestigious universities in Germany named as FAU Erlangen-Nuremberg. Upon the successful completion of my degree, I am looking forward to join a full-time Machine Learning Engineer/Data Scientist role.

I have been profoundly motivated by the power of Machine Learning. Thus, I love developing efficient yet scalable intelligent algorithms for a variety of application areas. During my professional as well as my academic career, I have essentially worked with Python, however, I have also spent an ample amount of hours programming in C++, R and SQL.

I am enthusiastic about learning new programming languages, keeping myself updated with the current advancements in Machine Learning community, new technologies and writing efficient as well as modular code. Consequently, I dedicate a portion of my free time taking online courses on Cloud computing services (AWS), Data structures, Databases, Big data technologies(Spark), and expanding my insight in the programming languages which I already know.

My Research Interests are:

  • Applied Machine Learning
  • Explainable AI
  • Improving the performance and robustness of Machine learning algorithms and Neural Networks
  • Uncertainty estimation in Deep Learning
  • Supervised, Unsupervised and Reinforcement Learning
